chapter.text: Ten ga sake warete
sono shu (no inochi) o kiki, shitagau toki
daichi ga nobe hiroge rare
sono Chu no mono o hakidashite sora ni nari
sono shu (no o meirei) o kiki, shitagau toki
O ningen yo, hontoni anata wa,-nushi no omoto e to roku shite doryoku suru mono. Kare ni au koto ni naru nodearu
Sonotoki migite ni sono shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa
kare no keisan wa sugu yoi ni seisan sa re
kare-ra wa yorokonde, jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaerudearou
Daga haigo ni shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa
jikani shi o motomete sakebu nodaga
moeru hono de yaka reyou
Hontoni kare wa, jibun no hitobito no naka de kanraku shite ita
Kare wa, hontoni (omo no moto ni) kaeru koto nado naidearou to omotte ita
Iya,-nushi wa itsumo kare o mitoshite ora reru
Watashi wa, rakujitsu no yubae ni yotte chikau
Yoru to, soreni kaeri tsudou mono ni oite
mata michitaru tsuki ni kakete (chikau)
Anata gata wa, kanarazu isso kara hoka-so ni noborudearou
Soredemo, kare-ra ga shinjinai no wa do shita wake ka
Kuruan ga, kare-ra ni Satoru 唱 Sa reru to, kare-ra wa sajida shiyou to wa shinai. 〔Sajida〕
iya, shinjinai mono wa,(sore o) usodearu to iu
Daga arra wa, kare-ra no mune ni kakusu koto o jukuchi nasa reru
Sorede anata wa, tsuretsuna chobatsu o kare-ra ni tsutae nasai
Daga shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni wa taeru koto no nai hosho ga arou
